channel.title: How servers get so amazing
channel.description: Well I started a server, and I'm a moderate coder, I don't find this stuff too hard, it's just, my source has almost nothing in it. I was wondering how some people have such amazing servers, I know they code it, but where do they find all the codes? If they code it from scratch, how do they know what to do?

item.title: How servers get so amazing
item.dc:creator: @Cyber_Punk Cyber Punk
item.description:
@Cyber_Punk wrote:

I tried… hm… a lot of the servers have coders, that are really experienced. The only problem is that they probably won’t code for me lol.

Read full topic

item.title: How servers get so amazing
item.dc:creator: @Threatening Threatening
item.description:
@Threatening wrote:

Lol the servers get so amazing because they learned how to code at the website java…i think… But if you want 2 add other stuff just go to tutorial section of forums…

Read full topic
